mean_cn: v. 投降；屈服；放弃；交出
mean_en: to admit that you have been defeated and want to stop fighting; to allow yourself to be caught, taken prisoner, etc.
sentence: Under such huge pressure, she finally surrendered.
sentence_trans: 在巨大的压力下，她不得不投降。
word_etyma: sur下面 + render给予 → 给到下面 → [把枪]放下 → surrender投降
